Label: plant phenological stage
Text definition: A {spatiotemporal region} that encompasses some part of the life of a plant part, a {whole plant}, or a population of plants and is part of a {plant growth cycle}.

Label: initial growth phenological stage
Text definition: A {plant phenological stage} in which some participant plant is in a {plant growth cycle} and has at least one {vegetative shoot system} that has not yet produced a {true leaf}.

Label: initial growth during first growth cycle phenological stage
Text definition: An {initial growth phenological stage} in which some participant plant is in its {initial growth cycle}.

Label: emergence during first growth cycle phenological stage
Parent: 'initial growth during first growth cycle phenological stage' (PPO:0000005)
Text definition: An {initial growth during first growth cycle phenological stage} in which some participant plant is visible above the ground and the plant has not yet produced a {true leaf}.

Label: initial growth during later growth cycle phenological stage
Text definition: An {initial growth phenological stage} in which some participant plant is in a {later growth cycle}.
Plant type: all vascular plants with later growth cycles

Label: emergence during later growth cycle phenological stage
Parent: 'initial growth during later growth cycle phenological stage' (PPO:0000019)
Text definition: An {initial growth during later growth cycle phenological stage} in which some participant plant is an herbaceous perennial plant, the plant is visible above the ground, and the plant has not yet produced a {true leaf} in its current growth cycle.

Label: new green shoots sprouting from nodes on existing stems phenological stage stage
Parent: 'initial growth during later growth cycle phenological stage' (PPO:0000019)
Text definition: An {initial growth during later growth cycle phenological stage} in which some participant plant has new growth visible on an existing above-ground {shoot system}.

Label: regreening of existing stems or vascular leaves phenological stage
Parent: 'initial growth during later growth cycle phenological stage' (PPO:0000019)
Text definition: An {initial growth during later growth cycle phenological stage} in which some participant plant is regreening.

Label: bud burst phenological stage
Parent: 'initial growth during later growth cycle phenological stage' (PPO:0000019)
Text definition: An {initial growth during later growth cycle phenological stage} in which some participant plant is a woody plant that has at least one {vegetative bud} in the {bud burst stage}.
Traits: % buds bursting, no. of buds bursting

Label: vascular leaf phenological stage
Text definition: A {plant phenological stage} in which some participant plant has at least one {true leaf}.

Label: leaf expansion phenological stage
Text definition: A {vascular leaf phenological stage} in which some participant plant has at least one {vascular leaf} in the {vascular leaf expansion stage}.
Traits: no. leaves in expansion stage, % leaves in expansion stage

Label: mature leaf phenological stage
Text definition: A {vascular leaf phenological stage} in which some participant plant has at least one {vascular leaf} in the {vascular leaf post-expansion stage}.
Traits: no. of mature leaves, % mature leaves

Label: senescent leaf phenological stage
Text definition: A {vascular leaf phenological stage} in which some participant plant has at least one {vascular leaf} in the {vascular leaf senescent stage}.
Plant type: all annual vascular plants and vascular plants with later growth cycles
Traits: no. of senesced leaves, % senesced leaves

Label: falling leaf phenological stage
Text definition: A {vascular leaf phenological stage} in which some participant plant has abscised at least one {vascular leaf} (i.e., when at least one leaf has undergone {leaf abscission}) but has not yet abscised all its leaves.
Traits: no. of abscised leaves, % abscised leaves
